products.name: Premium Wireless Headphones
products.description: Experience crystal-clear audio with our premium wireless headphones featuring active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and ultra-comfortable memory foam ear cushions.

products.name: Smart Watch Pro
products.description: Stay connected and healthy with our advanced smartwatch featuring heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking, and seamless smartphone integration.

products.name: Ultra HD 4K Monitor
products.description: Immerse yourself in stunning 4K resolution with this professional-grade monitor featuring HDR support and USB-C connectivity.

products.name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
products.description: Precision engineered for gaming with 20,000 DPI sensor, ultra-low latency wireless connection, and ergonomic design.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Powerful 360° sound with deep bass, waterproof design perfect for outdoor adventures, and 24-hour battery life.

products.name: Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: Premium mechanical keyboard with RGB backlighting, hot-swappable switches, and aircraft-grade aluminum frame.

products.name: Portable SSD 1TB
products.description: Ultra-fast portable solid state drive with read speeds up to 1050MB/s, compact design, and secure encryption.

products.name: Premium Cotton Shirt
products.description: Luxuriously soft 100% Egyptian cotton shirt with a modern slim fit, perfect for both casual and formal occasions.

products.name: Designer Leather Jacket
products.description: Handcrafted genuine leather jacket with timeless styling, premium YKK zippers, and exceptional durability.

products.name: Slim Fit Chinos
products.description: Versatile slim fit chinos crafted from premium stretch cotton, featuring a modern cut and comfortable wear throughout the day.

products.name: Cashmere Sweater
products.description: Luxuriously soft 100% cashmere sweater, the epitome of comfort and elegance for the discerning gentleman.

products.name: Oxford Shoes
products.description: Classic Oxford shoes handmade from premium Italian leather, featuring Goodyear welt construction for exceptional quality.

products.name: Silk Tie Set
products.description: Elegant silk tie set including tie, pocket square, and cufflinks, perfect for business and formal occasions.

products.name: Ceramic Vase Set
products.description: Handcrafted ceramic vase set with modern minimalist design, perfect for displaying fresh or dried flowers.

products.name: Scented Candle Collection
products.description: Luxury scented candle collection with three distinctive fragrances: vanilla bean, cedar wood, and jasmine blossom.

products.name: Velvet Throw Blanket
products.description: Ultra-soft velvet throw blanket with elegant fringe detailing, perfect for adding warmth and style to any room.

products.name: Marble Coffee Table
products.description: Stunning marble coffee table with solid brass legs, a statement piece that elevates any living space.

products.name: Abstract Art Print
products.description: Museum-quality abstract art print on premium paper, professionally framed and ready to hang.

products.name: Luxury Skincare Set
products.description: Complete skincare set including cleanser, toner, serum, and moisturizer, formulated with premium natural ingredients.

products.name: Perfume Collection
products.description: Exquisite perfume collection featuring three signature scents: floral, oriental, and fresh notes.

products.name: Premium Hair Care Kit
products.description: Professional hair care kit with shampoo, conditioner, and hair mask, enriched with argan oil and keratin.

products.name: Makeup Brush Set
products.description: Professional 12-piece makeup brush set with synthetic bristles, vegan-friendly materials, and elegant storage case.

products.name: Face Serum Trio
products.description: Advanced face serum trio targeting hydration, anti-aging, and brightening for complete skincare routine.

products.name: Organic Face Mask Set
products.description: Set of 10 premium organic face masks targeting various skin concerns including hydration, detox, and brightening.

instructions.ar: لتغيير الصور: ضع صورك الجديدة في مجلد images/ مع نفس الأسماء (product-01.jpg, product-02.jpg, إلخ)
instructions.en: To change images: Put your new images in images/ folder with same names (product-01.jpg, product-02.jpg, etc.)
